title: VAT API
description: A developer friendly API to help your business achieve VAT compliance

Response-Type.description: The default response type is application/json if you would like to receive an XML response then set this to XML

currency_to.name: currency_to

amount.description: Optional, an amount you are wanting to convert. Leave blank to just get the current rate

methods.description: We highly recommend if you are able, to check a VAT number on your end first to save wasted API lookups. It maybe that your customer has simply entered the wrong format. Heres a client side way to check the format using Javascript

country_rate.name: country_rate
country_rate.description: The VAT rate to get the price for. Default: standard

type.name: type
type.description: Optional, if the price is including VAT set the type to 'incl'. Otherwise the default is assumed as excluding VAT already, 'excl'

Response-Type.description: The default response type is application/json if you would like to receive an XML response then set this to XML
